response.overview: The "Hero League Baseball" is an organization set-up by several Pro Heroes to allow them the chance to play and compete in their spare time. For this year, the "Orcas", led by Gang Orca, and the "Lionels", led by Shishido, have made it to the finals. Present Mic narrates the game, accompanied by an extremely apathetic Eraser Head.
response.title: OVA: HLB
